sentences.en: The right oil: The chef uses palm oil, which he heats up to medium-high heat.
sentences.cn: 选对油： 皮塔克大厨使用的是棕榈油，他先将油烧热到中高温。

sentences.en: Discard any of the beans that float, and bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
sentences.cn: 扔掉漂浮的豆子，并用中-大火加热沸腾。

sentences.en: Heat a frying pan or wok on medium-high heat and add 2 tablespoons oil, swirling so that the bottom of the pan is coated.
sentences.cn: 预热平底锅的中间部分并加上2勺子油，旋转平底锅以致其底被有覆盖。
